name: TunariApp
tagline: App to manage products and clients for Tunari Business
body:
This is TunariApp Page!, currently we are in developing.  This is the place where you can download the product to install it

This project has started in July 2015 by Mirko Terrazas (@MirkoTV) and Wilmer Terrazas (@WilmerTV)

Wiki pages can be found at [wikis](https://github.com/TerVarSoft/TunariApp/wiki)

##TunariAPP

![Search](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/12484932/11018138/65e73aee-8590-11e5-903d-50b8aa98ba84.gif)
#About Install

###To use tunariApp you have to follow these steps:

* Download tunariApp
* Extract tunariApp
* Start mongodb database
* Go to tunari-1.x.x/bin and run tunari.bat
* Navigate to localhost:8000
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
